paper: ExPO-HM_ Learning to Explain-then-Detect for Hateful Meme Detection

differences.summary: Possible double weighting of CDE reward w

evidence.baseline_quote: CDE design may incentivize hedging and has approximation limits.
evidence.final_quote: CDE reward weight appears twice, risking unintended double weighting affecting optimization and reproducibility.

differences.summary: Entropy/log base units inconsistent for CDE
differences.why_impacts_score: Weakens theoretical rigor and correctness of bounds

evidence.baseline_quote: Theoretical calibration analysis relies on an ideal policy; empirical linkage from thresholds to calibration not quantified.
evidence.final_quote: Entropy units not specified; Eq.7 uses log without base, Appendix H.2 uses bits—undermines quantitative correctness.

differences.summary: Curriculum rationale length claim lacks evidence
differences.why_impacts_score: Reduces confidence in claimed curriculum benefit

evidence.baseline_quote: GRPO-CL produces longer, more detailed rationales (52 vs. 28 tokens; Sec. 4.4), indicating curriculum benefits.
evidence.final_quote: Claim of longer rationales is stated but not accompanied by a reporting table or figure.

differences.summary: Evaluation split annotations missing in main table
differences.why_impacts_score: Complicates replication and clarity of results

evidence.baseline_quote: Training details include curriculum split, facilitating replication.
evidence.final_quote: Evaluation split usage not explicit in Table 1, complicating exact replication.

differences.summary: Misstated Brier improvement vs GRPO baseline

evidence.baseline_quote: CDE reward improves calibration: ECE and Brier scores decrease across model sizes.
evidence.final_quote: Sec. 4.6 highlights 0.590→0.283; correct comparison vs. GRPO is 0.441→0.283.
Sec. 4.5 says SFT-B is below no-warmup, yet Table 3 shows BF1 slightly higher; statement should be qualified.

differences.summary: Technical Quality score decreased due to CDE specification issues

evidence.baseline_quote: Technical Quality (10): 7 — Sound formulation; gaps in fairness, variance, reward formulae.
evidence.final_quote: Technical Quality (10): 6 — gaps in CDE reward scaling/units clarity, fairness analyses, estimator variance.

differences.summary: Clarity score decreased due to added inconsistencies

evidence.baseline_quote: Clarity (10): 7 — Generally clear with helpful figures; minor inconsistencies reduce clarity.
evidence.final_quote: Clarity (10): 6 — moderate inconsistencies and missing split annotation reduce clarity.
